A Snow imp costume head is a reward obtained from the 2017 Christmas event, as well as subsequent Christmas events. It is part of the snow imp costume.

If destroyed, players can obtain a replacement from Diango in Draynor Village.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room, as part of the 2017: Snow imp costume set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

A '''Snow imp costume head''' is a reward obtained from the [[2017 Christmas event]], as well as subsequent Christmas events. It is part of the [[snow imp costume]].

If destroyed, players can obtain a replacement from [[Diango]] in [[Draynor Village]].

{{Costume storage|toy box|[[Snow imp costume|2017: Snow imp costume]] set|set=true}}
